## How It Works: Our Simple 3-Step Process

::: {style="display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; margin-bottom: 30px;"}
::: {style="flex: 1; min-width: 250px; background: #f9f9f9; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd;"}
### 1. Free Consultation {style="margin-top: 0;"}
Schedule a 30-minute Zoom call with Dr. Trampush to discuss your concerns and determine if our services meet your needs.

**Timeline:** Same week availability
:::

::: {style="flex: 1; min-width: 250px; background: #f9f9f9; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd;"}
### 2. Assessment {style="margin-top: 0;"}
Complete comprehensive testing tailored to your specific concerns (typically 4-8 hours across multiple sessions).

**Timeline:** 1-2 weeks after consultation
:::

::: {style="flex: 1; min-width: 250px; background: #f9f9f9; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd;"}
### 3. Results & Action Plan {style="margin-top: 0;"}
Receive detailed findings, diagnosis (if applicable), and actionable recommendations for home, school, or work.

**Timeline:** 2-3 weeks after testing
:::
:::

::: {.callout-important appearance="simple"}
## Quick Response Guarantee
We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.
:::

## Additional Services

### Telemedicine Options

We offer telemedicine services for the initial consultation and feedback sessions. In-person testing is typically required for the assessment portion.

### Testing at Home

In some cases, we can provide testing services at your home or place of residence for an additional fee. Please inquire during your consultation.

## Insurance & Fees

While we don't accept direct insurance payments, we provide detailed documentation that many clients successfully submit for out-of-network reimbursement. Assessment costs typically range from $3,000-$5,000 depending on complexity and specific needs.
